Lending News Archives Lending News Archives Back to News First Capital Client Corner: Wicked Barley Aug 2024 Few things hit the spot like a cold beer…especially from a stellar Florida craft brewery like Wicked Barley Brewing Company. Add a view of the water and you truly have a recipe for success! How it All Came Together In 2014, Wicked Barley Brewing was founded by brothers-in-law, Philip Maple and Tobin Turney. Having more than 30 years combined experience in home brewing, Maple and Turney had extensive knowledge in recipe development and brewery operations. With friends Brett Baker and Bradley Sueflohn joining the venture, Wicked Barley was destined for greatness. Realizing the restrictive and financial uncertainties of leasing property, the Wicked Barley team opted for the security and stability of owning their own place. With assistance from First Capital Finance Business Development Officer and Vice-President, Kristen Tackett, Wicked Barley secured $3.1MM in funding through the SBA 504 Loan Program for the ground-up construction of the brewery and taproom. Additionally, they partnered the 504 loan with an SBA 7(a) loan to provide money for inventory and working capital. “The SBA 504 Loan Program reduces risk for both the lender and borrowers. It enables small business owners from all backgrounds and industries – agriculture, retail, manufacturing, and breweries – access to capital that otherwise wouldn’t be available to them,” said Tackett. If You Build It, They Will Come Perched on the banks of Goodby’s Creek, Wicked Barley Brewing Company is Jacksonville’s only waterfront craft brewery. Since opening its doors in July of 2016, Wicked Barley has become a favorite spot for anyone seeking chill vibes and cold craft beer. The property features a large outdoor (dog friendly) beer garden, kayak launch, and a 100′ boat dock. Yep - you can access the brewery by boat! The taproom provides ample seating and 20 taps with delicious house brewed beers, ciders, and meads. Wicked Good Beer and Bites In addition to the award-winning beer, with Sueflohn serving as Executive Chef, the from-scratch fare has gained tremendous attention. And no wonder! Sueflohn honed his skills in some of the best kitchens in Las Vegas, including the famed Le Cirque restaurant. In 2017, Wicked Barley was voted Best Brew Pub in the state of Florida by Best Florida Beer and in 2022, it ranked #9 on USA Today’s list of 10 best brew pubs across the country. Wicked Barley struck gold in 2022 at the prestigious Great American Beer Festival in Denver, Colorado. They brought home a gold medal from the 40th annual competition for their Amber Ale, "Argument Starter.” Clearly, there was no argument from the judges. And That’s Not All… Having enjoyed the tremendous success of Wicked Brewing Company, Maple has left the day-to-day brewery operations to start a new venture – Barley and Pie, located in Fleming Island, Florida. Though he remains a silent partner in Wicked Barley, Maple’s Italian ancestry inspired him to start the new business. In an interview in the Jacksonville Business Journal, Maple said, "Growing up, one thing my dad always did was brew craft beer and make pizza dough,” Maple said. “I’ve had a burning desire to do pizza recipes for 20 years.” Having experience with the benefits of the SBA 504 Loan Program, Maple turned again to First Capital Finance and Kristen Tackett to fund $902,334 in brewery and restaurant equipment. In addition to the incredible pizza, as its name suggests, Barley and Pie offers an array of beers brewed on site, continuing the excellent tradition Maple began at Wicked Barley. First Capital Finance applauds the innovation, persistence, and hard work exhibited by the founders of Wicked Barley Brewing and Barley and Pie. We are honored to assist in the launch and success of small businesses across Florida, Georgia, and Alabama! Connect with Kristen: kristen@ffcfc.com | 904.861.2270 First Capital Finance/Florida First Capital has an expert team of Business Development Officers working with small businesses throughout Florida, Georgia, and Alabama. To get in touch with a BDO in your area, visit ffcfc.com/talk-to-a-loan-exper Archived 2025 - June 2025 - April 2025 - March 2025 - February 2024 - October 2024 - August 2024 - June 2024 - May 2024 - April 2024 - January 2023 - November 2023 - October 2023 - September 2023 - August 2023 - July 2023 - June 2023 - April 2023 - March 2023 - February 2022 - November 2022 - October 2022 - August 2022 - July 2022 - June 2022 - May 2022 - April 2022 - March 2022 - February 2022 - January 2021 - December 2021 - November 2021 - October 2021 - September 2021 - August 2021 - July 2021 - June 2021 - May 2021 - April 2021 - March 2021 - February 2021 - January 2020 - December 2020 - November 2020 - October 2020 - September 2020 - August Contact Us facebook twitter linkedin instagram First Capital Finance/Florida First Capital First Capital Finance/Florida First Capital (FCF/FFC) is a non-profit certified development company promoting economic development and job creation.
        Under the SBA 504 Loan Program , FCF/FFC works with private-sector lenders to provide eligible small
        business owners in Alabama, Florida, and Georgia with below-market, fixed interest rate long-term financing to buy or build commercial property and/or purchase fixed heavy duty machinery and
        equipment. Florida First Capital also lends under the Rebuild Florida Business Loan
        Fund as well as the Florida Recycling Loan Program and other small business
        assistance programs. Corporate Headquarters: 1351 N. Gadsden Street, Tallahassee, FL 32303.  Ph: 800.504.LOAN or 850.681.3601. © 2023 First Capital Finance/Florida First Capital Finance.  All Rights Reserved.

Please choose which drop down option accurately describes your query and use the contact details set out within the drop down box or complete the Contact form below. Track your order Use our handy tool to see the status of your order. You can track its location whilst it is on its way to you - with or without a Wickes account. To track your Wickes kitchen, bathroom or home office order, please complete our contact form; selecting 'Kitchen & bathroom'. Scroll down, it's just below. With our handy order tracking tool you can see: The date your order will be delivered The delivery carrier Where each part of your order will be delivered from When your Click & Collect order is ready to collect from your local store We're unable to offer live order tracking just yet, but we'll send you a text the day before your delivery with further details on when you can expect your order to arrive. Contact our customer service team When getting in touch with us, we need to confirm we’re talking to the right person. We’ll ask you a few questions to confirm you’re the person that paid for the order. If you’d like someone else to speak on your behalf, please ensure they’ve all the information necessary to pass our required Data Protection checks. Any conversation about order amendments, including refund requests, must be with the person that paid for the order. We are open: Monday - Saturday: 8am - 6pm Sunday: 10am - 5pm Here's some hints to help you choose the best way to contact us for your enquiry: Complete our Contact Form, scroll down, it's just below. We aim to respond to all enquiries within 48 hours. If you've received a damaged delivery or a faulty product, we'll ask you to email us some photos Use Live Chat - click ‘Chat’ on the bottom right of this page If you're unsure about what you've ordered If you've a question about our stock If you're asking about a delivery that's due today You can also call us on 0330 123 4123 If there's a queue you'll be given the option to ask for a call back. We’ll call you back when it's your turn. Contact our designed kitchen and bathroom team Wickes kitchen, bathroom or home office enquiries For enquiries about a Wickes kitchen, bathroom or home office order, please complete our contact form; selecting 'Kitchen & bathroom' as your reason for contacting us. Scroll down, it's just below. If you’d like to talk, call us on 0344 892 2721 . If you’d prefer to use Live Chat - click ‘Chat’ on the bottom right of this page. When getting in touch with us, we need to confirm we’re talking to the right person. We’ll ask you a few questions to confirm you’re the person that paid for the order. If you’d like someone else to speak on your behalf, please ensure they’ve all the information necessary to pass our required Data Protection checks. Any conversation about order amendments, including refund requests, must be with the person that paid for the order. We’re open: Monday - Friday 8am - 6pm Saturday - 8am - 4pm To book a design appointment Whether you're looking for a new kitchen, bathroom or home office; our Design Consultants have the knowledge and expertise to help you plan your space perfectly. Complete our online form Call us on: 0800 011 3031 We’re open: Monday - Friday: 9am - 8pm Saturday & Sunday: 9am - 5:30pm Community programme and charity requests We support charities and local communities in two ways: Nationally, we’re proud to be supporting The Brain Tumour Charity as our corporate charity partner.  This means we’re unable to offer monetary support to other causes. Locally, we support  the community through our Wickes Community Programme by providing products to help local charities and not for profit community groups. To apply for a product donation just head in to your local store and speak to the manager. Terms and conditions Press and media Please contact the press office at Clarion Communications on (0)20 7479 0910 or email wickes@clarioncomms.co.uk . Please note, these contact details are for media enquiries only. Complaints Our Commitment We’re dedicated to providing a professional and valued service to our customers and partners. We strive to handle customer complaints promptly and fairly. Contacting Us If you're unhappy with something, the fastest way to reach us is through our online chat service. If you'd prefer to talk, call us at 0330 123 4123 : Choose option 1 for a Wickes kitchen, bathroom or home office complaint. Choose option 3 for all other complaints. To escalate your concern, use the contact form below. Select the relevant order type and choose "Something went wrong and I want to raise a complaint." We will acknowledge your complaint within 48 hours and forward it to the appropriate team. Further information might be needed to fully investigate your complaint. Alternatively, you can write to us at our registered address: Complaints Team Wickes Building Supplies Limited Vision House 19 Colonial Way Watford WD24 4JL To help us respond to you as quickly as possible, please include: Your name and address A contact phone number and email Your order number Details of your complaint with supporting photos Actions you’d like us to consider In the event that the customer services team is unable to resolve your complaint, or if you’re unhappy with the outcome, you can escalate your complaint by emailing customer.relations@wickes.co.uk , who will acknowledge your complaint within 48 hours and send it to the appropriate team. Resolution We aim to resolve your complaint at the first point of contact. Once the investigation is complete, you will be informed of the outcome. If you remain unhappy with the outcome, you can refer the decision to The Furniture and Home Improvement Ombudsman . They will review your case and may request further information from you or from us. Their decision will be binding upon us. For more information, visit fhio.org . Complaints relating to financial agreements If your complaint relates to the lender, it will be forwarded to them within five days of receipt. We will inform you once it has been sent. If the complaint is partially about the lender's actions, that part will be sent to the lender to investigate, while we will investigate the part related to the sale of the financial product and service. We will conduct a thorough and independent investigation and agree on a suitable outcome with you. Once our investigation is complete, we will inform you of the outcome. If you’re unhappy with the outcome, you can refer your complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service . They can be contacted at: Phone: 0800 023 4567 Email: complaint.info@financial-ombudsman.org.uk Mail: Financial Ombudsman Service, Exchange Tower, London E14 9SR Contact form Required Field Reason for contacting us Order & support enquiries How can we help?
